mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT (MNUM, CCONTENT, CWDATE) VALUES(#{mNum}, #{cContent}, SYSDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT SET CCONTENT=#{cContent}, CCDATE=SYSDATE() WHERE CNUM=#{cNum}
mapper.select: SELECT C.CNUM, CCONTENT, CWDATE, MID, CCDATE FROM COMMENT C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MNUM = M.MNUM JOIN BOARD B ON B.BNUM=C.BNUM WHERE B.BNUM= #{bNum} ORDER BY CWDATE ASC
